name: NSPopoverTouchBarItem
desc: A bar item that provides a two-state control that can expand into its second state, showing the contents of a bar that it owns.

items.name: var collapsedRepresentation: NSView
items.desc: The view displayed when this item is displayed in its parent bar.

items.name: var collapsedRepresentationImage: NSImage?
items.desc: The image displayed by the button for the default collapsed representation.

items.name: var collapsedRepresentationLabel: String
items.desc: The localized string displayed by the button for the default collapsed representation.

items.name: var popoverTouchBar: NSTouchBar
items.desc: The bar displayed when this item is "popped."

items.name: var showsCloseButton: Bool
items.desc: A Boolean value that determines whether a close button should be shown on the popover bar.

items.name: var pressAndHoldTouchBar: NSTouchBar?
items.desc: The bar that is displayed when a user press-and-holds on the popover item.

items.name: func showPopover(Any?)
items.desc: Replaces the main bar with this item's popover bar.

items.name: func dismissPopover(Any?)
items.desc: Restores the previously visible main bar.

items.name: func makeStandardActivatePopoverGestureRecognizer() -> NSGestureRecognizer
items.desc: Returns a gesture recognizer, configured to invoke the showPopover(_:) method.

items.name: var customizationLabel: String!
items.desc: The user-visible string identifying this item during bar customization.
